newsItems.title: New Findings on Addiction Recovery Techniques
newsItems.summary: Researchers have identified new techniques for overcoming addiction, emphasizing the role of social support and behavioral therapy in long-term recovery.

newsItems.title: The Impact of Addiction on Mental Health
newsItems.summary: Addiction not only affects physical health but also leads to serious mental health challenges like depression and anxiety. Early intervention is crucial.

newsItems.title: Substance Abuse and Brain Chemistry
newsItems.summary: New studies explore how long-term substance abuse alters brain chemistry, contributing to dependency and difficulty in quitting.
